text: Harvey Doolittle Colvin (December 18, 1815 - April 16, 1892) was an American politician. He was the mayor of Chicago, Illinois from 1873 to 1875. He was a member of the People's Party. Colvin was born on December 18, 1815. Find-A- Grave profile for Harvey Doolittle Colvin He was never married and had no children. Colvin died on April 16, 1892 in Chicago, Illinois from an illness, aged 76. ==References== Category:1815 births Category:1892 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Chicago Category:Burials at Rosehill Cemetery Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Politicians from New York (state)
title: Harvey Doolittle Colvin
